primevc.gui.layout.LayoutFlags

type
class
Collection of change flags for the layout-objects.

Static Variables

ALGORITHM(inline,null) : Int

Flag indicating that a property of the layout algorithm is changed and the layout needs to be validated again.

ALL_PROPERTIES(inline,null) : Int

ASPECT_RATIO(inline,null) : Int

CHILDREN_INVALIDATED(inline,null) : Int

Flag indicating that the children of the layout algorithm have changed.

CHILD_HEIGHT(inline,null) : Int

CHILD_WIDTH(inline,null) : Int

EXPLICIT_HEIGHT(inline,null) : Int

EXPLICIT_WIDTH(inline,null) : Int

FILL(inline,null) : Int

Property is not meant as a flag but to incicate that a layout-client. percentage property is set to fill the left space

HEIGHT(inline,null) : Int

HEIGHT_CONSTRAINTS(inline,null) : Int

HEIGHT_PROPERTIES(inline,null) : Int

HEIGHT_VALIDATOR(inline,null) : Int

Flag indicating that the height validator is changed

INCLUDE(inline,null) : Int

Flag indicating the includeInLayout property has changed

LIST(inline,null) : Int

Flag indicating that when the list with children of a layoutgroup have changed.

MAINTAIN_ASPECT(inline,null) : Int

MARGIN(inline,null) : Int

MAX_HEIGHT(inline,null) : Int

MAX_WIDTH(inline,null) : Int

MEASURED_HEIGHT(inline,null) : Int

MEASURED_WIDTH(inline,null) : Int

MIN_HEIGHT(inline,null) : Int

MIN_WIDTH(inline,null) : Int

PADDING(inline,null) : Int

PERCENT_HEIGHT(inline,null) : Int

PERCENT_WIDTH(inline,null) : Int

POSITION(inline,null) : Int

RELATIVE(inline,null) : Int

The relative property or properties of the relative object are changed.

ROTATION(inline,null) : Int

SIZE(inline,null) : Int

WIDTH(inline,null) : Int

WIDTH_CONSTRAINTS(inline,null) : Int

WIDTH_PROPERTIES(inline,null) : Int

WIDTH_VALIDATOR(inline,null) : Int

Flag indicating that the width validator is changed

X(inline,null) : Int
